name: Tour de Arizona
description: How can anybody finish second in a bicycle race through Monument Valley when he has a gun? That’s probably why this kind of competition never happend in real life. Fortunatelly there’s Ludum Dare and my first ever admission to it, which is also first published project of mine. In the game, you are a possibly brave and definitely ginger gunslinger fighting his way through the race. Survive as long as you can and eliminate as many rivals as possible!
